in.ac.iitb.cfilt.jhwnl.dictionary
Interface MorphologicalProcessor

All Known Implementing Classes:
StemItMorphologicalProcessor
public interface MorphologicalProcessor

Class : MorphologicalProcessor Purpose : This class is used for obtaining the base form of an inflected word.

Method Summary
 java.util.List lookupAllBaseForms(POS pos, java.lang.String derivation)
          Return all the base forms of derivation in a List of Strings
 IndexWord lookupBaseForm(POS pos, java.lang.String derivation)
          Try to obtain a root base form for the derivation.
 

Method Detail

lookupBaseForm

IndexWord lookupBaseForm(POS pos,
                         java.lang.String derivation)
                         throws JHWNLException
Try to obtain a root base form for the derivation. If there is more than one possible root form, then the first call to this method should return the first base form found. The latter method call behaviour is undefined, either the first root form or subsequent root forms can be returned.

Throws:
JHWNLException

lookupAllBaseForms

java.util.List lookupAllBaseForms(POS pos,
                                  java.lang.String derivation)
                                  throws JHWNLException
Return all the base forms of derivation in a List of Strings

Throws:
JHWNLException
